rows.label: qst002304_msg0001
rows.name:
It's so tough round here lately. With the
anti-Blade protests gaining momentum,
us guards don't have a moment's rest.

rows.label: qst002304_msg0002
rows.name:
Don't the idiots see that getting rid of
Blades isn't going to stop wars from
happening?

rows.label: qst002304_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, um...I guess I shouldn't say that,
though. Not exactly professional of me.

rows.label: qst002304_msg0004
rows.name: Good luck with your research, though!
